course_title: Topics In Computer Science: Biomedical Image Analysis
class_notes: This course focuses on computational analytic and interpretive approaches to optimize extraction and use of biological and clinical imaging data for diagnostic and therapeutic translational medical applications.
sections: Class Nbr: 1902, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:40-3:55p, Instructor: I. Banerjee, Status: Open
